languages.text: {n}Ваши слова эхом разносятся по мостику. Несколько пиратов кивают друг другу и направляют оружие в сторону капитана.{/n}
{n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова эхом разносятся по мостику. Несколько пиратов кивают друг другу и направляют оружие в сторону капитана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. Some of the pirates nod to each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu voz resuena por el puente. Algunos de los piratas asienten y apuntan a su capitán.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu voz resuena por el puente. Algunos de los piratas asienten y apuntan a su capitán.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的声音在舰桥上回响。几个海盗互相使了个眼色，点了点头，随后便举起武器，指向他们的船长。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的声音在舰桥上回响。几个海盗互相使了个眼色，点了点头，随后便举起武器，指向他们的船长。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre voix résonne à travers la passerelle. Quelques-uns des pirates se regardent en opinant du chef et braquent leurs armes sur leur capitaine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre voix résonne à travers la passerelle. Quelques-uns des pirates se regardent en opinant du chef et braquent leurs armes sur leur capitaine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの声がブリッジに響き渡る。数人の海賊が互いにうなずき、彼らのキャプテンに武器を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声がブリッジに響き渡る。数人の海賊が互いにうなずき、彼らのキャプテンに武器を向ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sesin köprüde yankılanıyor. Korsanların birkaçı birbirlerine bakıp silahlarını kaptanlarına doğrultuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your voice echoes across the bridge. A few of the pirates nod at each other and point their weapons at their captain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesin köprüde yankılanıyor. Korsanların birkaçı birbirlerine bakıp silahlarını kaptanlarına doğrultuyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Stimme hallt über die Brücke. Einige der Piraten nicken sich zu und richten ihre Waffen auf ihren Kapitän.{/n}
